text: Yegoryevsky District () is an administrativeLaw #28-ZS and municipalLaw #93-ZS district (raion), one of the fifty-nine in Altai Krai, Russia. It is located in the southwest of the krai. The area of the district is . Its administrative center is the rural locality (a selo) of Novoyegoryevskoye. Population: The population of Novoyegoryevskoye accounts for 40.9% of the district's total population. ==References== ===Notes=== ===Sources=== * * Category:Districts of Altai Krai
title: Yegoryevsky District, Altai Krai
